142b
(1) A creditor may request the transfer of an heirless estate to a bankruptcy estate without heirs within six months of receipt of the heirless estate notice or within six months of the day of the publication of the announcement in the case of an unknown creditor by:
filing a request in the probate proceedings and
filing a motion for the initiation of bankruptcy proceedings for an estate without heirs.
(2) The creditor must attach the certificate of filing the proposal for the initiation of bankruptcy proceedings for an estate without heirs to the request to transfer the estate to the bankruptcy estate of the estate without heirs.
